name: PATHTime
0:
”Alexa, ask Path Time when is the next train from Exchange Place to 33rd Street”
”Alexa, ask Path Time what time is the next train to 23rd Street”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: path time
des:
With Path Time, you can check the schedule and plan trips on PATH train, which connects New Jersey and Manhattan.

- Support night, weekend, and holiday schedule
- Support trips that require a transfer
- Remembers your usual origin and destinations, so you can just ask "when is the next train"
